events.text: Yeah, because my wife is fucking dead and I’m fighting back against my own body!!! On top of that, some half human half monster creatures attacked me on my way here!!
Oh no. Those side effects of time reset is damaging our surroundings far worse than I anticipated.
Now calm down just a second. There’s no need to make this worse.
Worse how!? We’re already near the worst!!
Hold on, I might have something to help this problem.
What is it!? Tell me NOW!!!

I have a large gun here that will send a person to a parallel universe, like opening a portal to a parallel reality, a portal gun if you will. Now after we treat your condition, we could send you to a parallel universe where you have already passed away from your condition.
That seems incredibly farfetched. What are the side effects of this gun and how do you know it wouldn’t just create an even greater problem than what there already is?

Unfortunately, I don’t know the answers to those questions. I can’t even guarantee that you’ll even end up in a reality where you actually contracted your current condition and died. But this is the only option you have if you want to see your wife again.
Plus I can’t afford to leave [Daughter] alone just for my own happiness. I don’t think I can do this.
Just providing you with an option. Whether you take it or not is your call.
Okay, now what is the progress on that cure?

Well, I just managed to start synthesis on the serum and it looks very promising. Judging by the looks of it, it should be ready in about [color=#73bed3]two more days[/color]. So about [color=#73bed3]two more resets[/color] give or take.
Now go ahead and get into the machine. You know the process by now.
